object.name: AlertMessage
object.desc: An alert message that is associated with a student

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Type of alert message (e.g. "Legal")

element.name: AlertMessage
element.desc: The AlertMessage element contains an alert message that is associated with the student.

object.name: AttendanceCodeInfo
object.desc: This object is to provides information about a particular attendance code, allows applications to synchronize each other's attendance code tables, or to provide a dynamic list of attendance codes. SIF_Events are reported.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that identifies this AttendanceCodeInfo entity

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that identifies the school where the attendance code is used

element.name: AttendanceCode
element.desc: Locally defined code for attendance

element.name: AttendanceType
element.desc: Type of attendance

element.name: AttendanceStatus
element.desc: Excused status of the attendance code

element.name: Description
element.desc: The text description of the attendance code

element.name: AttendanceValue
element.desc: Portion of the attendance relative to the time span being reported (e.g., day, period, section), up to three decimal places. This element has been removed in SIF 2.0

element.name: PickupRights
element.desc: This element tells whether or not the contact has pickup rights.

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: The type of credit offered

object.name: CreditsAttempted
object.desc: Number of credits the student is attempting to earn. If present, this element's value overrides the credits in SchoolCourseInfo and SectionInfo.

object.name: EducationAgencyType
object.desc: The classification of the education agency within the geographic boundaries of a state according to the level of administrative and operational control.

attribute.name: Code
attribute.desc: Code indicating the operational/administrative level.ValuesEducation Agency Type [CCD]

value.name: REG_DISTRICT
value.desc: Regular local school district that is not a component of a supervisory union. This category includes both independent school districts and those that are a dependent segment of a local government such as a city or county. INCLUDE agencies that do not operate schools (non-ops) but have primary responsibility to provide free public elementary and/or secondary education to school-age children within their jurisdictions.

value.name: SUPERVISED_DISTRICT
value.desc: Local school district that is a component of a supervisory union. A superintendent and administrative services are shared with other local school districts. Each agency given this code should have an entry in the Supervisory Union Identification Number field corresponding to the appropriate type 3 or type 4 agency. Non-ops in supervisory unions should be included in this category.

value.name: SUPERVISORY_UNION
value.desc: Supervisory union administrative center, or county superintendentâ€™s office serving the same purposes. Each agency given this code should have an entry in the Supervisory Union Identification Number data field. Student and staff data reported elsewhere should NOT be duplicated in records carrying this code.

value.name: REGIONAL_AGENCY
value.desc: Regional education services agency (RESA). Agencies created for the purposes of providing specialized educational services to other education agencies. Student and staff data reported elsewhere should NOT be duplicated in records carrying this code.

value.name: STATE_AGENCY
value.desc: State agency charged with providing elementary and/or secondary level instruction to school-age children in a specified population, e.g., agency responsible for state schools for blind or deaf students, correctional facilities, and state hospitals.

value.name: FEDERAL_AGENCY
value.desc: Federal agency charged with providing elementary and/or secondary level instruction to school-age children in a specified population.

value.name: OTHER_AGENCY
value.desc: Other education agencies that do not fit into the first six categories.

value.name: 0710_GOVERNMENT
value.desc: Government - A federal, regional, state, or local government agency

value.name: 0710_MILITARY
value.desc: Military - A branch of the armed forces

value.name: 0710_SELF_EMP
value.desc: Self-Employed - Earning income directly from one's own business, trade, or profession rather than as an employee of another individual or organization

value.name: 0710_MILITARY_DOD
value.desc: Military/Department of Defense - Civilian employment in a branch of the armed forces or the U.S. Department of Defense

value.name: 0710_AGRICULTURAL
value.desc: Agricultural/Fishery Seasonal Employer - A farm, ranch, processing establishment, cannery, gin, packing shed, nursery, or other entity that produces or conditions seed, and that recruits, solicits, hires, employs, furnishes, or transports any migrant or seasonal agricultural worker

object.name: EnrollStatus
object.desc: The status of an enrollment

object.name: GradeClassification
object.desc: An indication of the grade level(s) the individual is assigned

attribute.name: Code
attribute.desc: The type of school grade level classification this is. Source: 0038 (Applicable Grades) [NCES Handbooks]

object.name: HomeEnrollment
object.desc: Enrollment-related information for the school that is responsible for reporting the student's membership/child accounting information. This is most likely the primary enrollment site for the student.

element.name: SchoolName
element.desc: Name of the school.

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: Provide both the HomeEnrollment/SchoolId and HomeEnrollment/LocalId elements if possible. If not, one or the other must be provided.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-defined identifier for this school. For a description, see the common element 5.1.16 LocalId. Provide both the HomeEnrollment/LocalId and HomeEnrollment/SchoolId elements if possible. If not, one or the other must be provided.

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: The state or province defined identifier for this school. For a description, see the common element 5.1.29 StatePrId.

element.name: Status
element.desc: Enrollment status as of the SnapDate.

element.name: GradeLevel
element.desc: Grade or academic level of student. For a description of this element, see the common element 5.1.11 GradeLevel.

element.name: HomeroomNumber
element.desc: The locally-defined identifier for this room. For a description, see the common element HomeroomNumber.

element.name: FullYearEnrollment
element.desc: An indication as to whether or not the student was enrolled for the whole school year. If the SchoolYear is in progress as of the SnapDate, use the value "Unknown".

object.name: LEAContact
object.desc: Information on contact persons for this LEA.

element.name: PublishInDirectory
element.desc: Indicates whether or not this LEA contact's information should be published in a directory of LEA information. For a description of this element, see 5.1.24 PublishInDirectory.

element.name: ContactInfo
element.desc: For a description of this element, see 5.1.3 ContactInfo.

element.name: LEAContact
element.desc: Information on contact persons for this LEA.

object.name: LEAInfo
object.desc: This object contains information about a school district or other Local Educational Agency (LEA). SIF_Events are reported.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of the LEA whose information this is.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-assigned identifier for this LEA.For a description of this element, see 5.1.16 LocalId.

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: The state-assigned identifier for this LEA.For a description of this element, see 5.1.29 StatePrId.

element.name: NCESId
element.desc: The NCES-assigned identifier for this LEA.For a description of this element, see 5.1.19 NCESId.

element.name: LEAName
element.desc: Name of LEA.

element.name: LEAURL
element.desc: URL for the LEA.

element.name: EducationAgencyType
element.desc: The classification of the education agency within the geographic boundaries of a state according to the level of administrative and operational control.

element.name: LEAContactList
element.desc: Information on contact persons for this LEA.

element.name: PhoneNumberList
element.desc: The LEA's phone numbers. For a description of this element, see 5.1.22 PhoneNumber.Note: When using the NCES code set, use "18" to designate a main office phone number.

element.name: AddressList
element.desc: The LEA's addresses. For a description of this element, see 5.1.1 Address.

element.name: IdentificationInfoList
element.desc: Other identification information associated with an LEA, such as the locally-defined code/identifier, etc.

element.name: GradeLevels
element.desc: Collection of grade levels offered in this LEA.For a description of this element, see 5.1.12 GradeLevels.

element.name: OperationalStatus
element.desc: Operational condition of an LEA. For a description of this element, see 5.1.20 OperationalStatus.

element.name: CongressionalDistrict
element.desc: Number for the US congressional district where the LEA is located. For a description of this element, see 5.1.2 CongressionalDistrict.

attribute.name: Code
attribute.desc: Source: 1280 (Location of Instruction)

attribute.name: Code
attribute.desc: Source: 1270 (Principal Medium of Instruction)

value.name: SCHOOL_OPEN
value.desc: School Open: School is currently in operation with no significant change in instructional levels and programs.

value.name: SCHOOL_CLOSED
value.desc: School Closed: School is not currently open in operation and is not expected to operate in the future.

value.name: SCHOOL_INACTIVE
value.desc: School Inactive: School is temporarily closed (e.g. under construction) and may reopen within three years.

value.name: SCHOOL_NEW
value.desc: New School: School is newly created or completely restructured into the instructional levels and programs that are currently in operation.

value.name: SCHOOL_FUTURE
value.desc: Future School: School is scheduled to be operational within two years.

value.name: AGENCY_CHANGED
value.desc: Changed Agency: School is affiliated with another agency although the internal organization and instructional level have not changed.

element.name: ContactName
element.desc: The name of the principal

element.name: ContactTitle
element.desc: The principal's title

object.name: RoomInfo
object.desc: This object contains all of the information about a school's room. This object contains a reference to a room type so that it may represent anything from a gym, cafeteria, to a standard classroom.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies this room

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies the school that this room belongs to

element.name: RoomNumber
element.desc: Room number as presented to the user/application.

element.name: StaffList
element.desc: Staff assigned to this room. For example, the homeroom teacher.

element.name: Description
element.desc: Friendly name that can be assigned to the room. For example, Staff Cafeteria.

element.name: Building
element.desc: Extra building information.

element.name: HomeroomNumber
element.desc: When a room is designated as a homeroom it may have a different room number. Usually blank when the room is not a homeroom.

element.name: Size
element.desc: Size of the room in square feet"

element.name: Capacity
element.desc: Number of persons (usually students) that this room can hold

element.name: PhoneNumber
element.desc: The room's phone numbers.

element.name: RoomTypeRefId
element.desc: The type of room

object.name: RoomInfoRefId
object.desc: The ID (GUID) of the room in which this section is taught

object.name: RoomType
object.desc: Identifies a type of room such as a cafeteria, gym, classroom, etc. SIF_Events are reported.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies this room type

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies the school that this room type belongs to

element.name: Description
element.desc: Description of the room type.

object.name: ScheduleInfo
object.desc: The schedule-related information for a section repeating for each term in which the session is scheduled

attribute.name: TermInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the term to which this schedule information relates

element.name: TeacherList
element.desc: The teacher(s) who teach this section

element.name: SectionRoomList
element.desc: The ID (GUID) of the room in which this section is taught

element.name: MeetingTimeList
element.desc: The time(s) this section meets

object.name: ScheduleInfoOverride
object.desc: A complete replacement of the ScheduleInfo of the section for this student; this should be a subset of the schedule information for the section

attribute.name: Override
attribute.desc: Designates whether or not scheduling information has been overridden with different values for this student ("Yes" or "No")

attribute.name: TermInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the term to which this override information relates for this student

element.name: MeetingTimeList
element.desc: Time(s) this section meets for this student; this should be a subset of the meeting times for the section

element.name: ScheduleInfoOverride
element.desc: A complete replacement of the ScheduleInfo of the section for this student; this should be a subset of the schedule information for the section

object.name: SchoolCourseInfo
object.desc: This object is for course information. SIF_Events are reported.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies this course

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that identifies the school where the course is offered

element.name: CourseCode
element.desc: School-defined local code for the course

element.name: StateCourseCode
element.desc: State-defined standard course code used to report information about courses

element.name: DistrictCourseCode
element.desc: The corresponding district course code

element.name: SubjectAreaList
element.desc: Subject matter area or department

element.name: CourseTitle
element.desc: Title of the course

element.name: Description
element.desc: Text description of the course

element.name: InstructionalLevel
element.desc: An indication of the general nature and difficulty of instruction provided

element.name: CourseCredits
element.desc: The number of credits awarded upon course completion

element.name: CoreAcademicCourse
element.desc: The number of credits awarded upon course completion

element.name: GraduationRequirement
element.desc: The number of credits awarded upon course completion

object.name: SchoolCourseInfoOverride
object.desc: Optional overrides of the course information for a section

attribute.name: Override
attribute.desc: Designates whether or not SchoolCourseInfo information has been overridden with different values for this section

element.name: CourseCode
element.desc: Override of the school-defined course code for this section

element.name: StateCourseCode
element.desc: Override of the state-defined course code for this section

element.name: DistrictCourseCode
element.desc: Override of the district course code for this section

element.name: SubjectArea
element.desc: Override of the subject matter area for this section

element.name: CourseTitle
element.desc: Override of the course title for this section

element.name: InstructionalLevel
element.desc: Override of the instructional level for this section

element.name: CourseCredits
element.desc: Override of the course credits for this section

element.name: SchoolFocus
element.desc: The type of educational institution as classified by its focus.

object.name: SchoolId
object.desc: Provide both the HomeEnrollment/SchoolId and HomeEnrollment/LocalId elements if possible. If not, one or the other must be provided.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the School.

object.name: SchoolInfo
object.desc: This object contains information about a school. SIF_Events are reported.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of the school whose information this is

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-assigned identifier for this school. For a description of this element, see 5.1.16 LocalId.

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: The state-assigned identifier for this school. For a description of this element, see 5.1.29 StatePrId.

element.name: NCESId
element.desc: The NCES-assigned identifier for this school. For a description of this element, see 5.1.19 NCESId

element.name: SchoolName
element.desc: Name of the school

element.name: LEAInfoRefId
element.desc: School district of which this school is a member.

element.name: OtherLEA
element.desc: Other related education agency, such as a regional service agency.

element.name: SchoolJurisdiction
element.desc: A SPEEDE/ExPRESS code that identifies the jurisdiction for this school

element.name: SchoolType
element.desc: An indication of the level of the educational institution.

element.name: SchoolFocusList
element.desc: The type of educational institution as classified by its focus.

element.name: SchoolURL
element.desc: URL for the school

element.name: PrincipalInfo
element.desc: Information about the school's principal

element.name: SchoolContactList
element.desc: Information on contact persons for this school.

element.name: PhoneNumberList
element.desc: The school's phone numbers

element.name: AddressList
element.desc: The school's address

element.name: IdentificationInfoList
element.desc: The school's identification information

element.name: SessionType
element.desc: A SPEEDE/ExPRESS code that specifies the session type

element.name: LowGradeLevel
element.desc: Lowest grade level offered in this school (deprecated)

element.name: HighGradeLevel
element.desc: Highest grade level offered in this school (deprecated)

element.name: GradeLevels
element.desc: Collection of grade levels offered in this school. For a description of this element, see 5.1.12 GradeLevels.

element.name: Title1Status
element.desc: Status of the school's Title I eligibility. Certain schools are designated under appropriate state and federal regulations as being eligible for participation in programs authorized by Title I of Public Law 103-382. Values: Targeted - Certain students enrolled in the school are eligible for Title I programs SchoolWide - All students in the school are eligible for Title I programs NA - Not applicable, school is not eligible for Title I programs

element.name: OperationalStatus
element.desc: Operational condition of a school. For a description of this element, see 5.1.20 OperationalStatus.

element.name: CongressionalDistrict
element.desc: Number for the US congressional district of the school location. For a description of this element, see 5.1.2 CongressionalDistrict.

attribute.name: Code
attribute.desc: A SPEEDE/ExPRESS code that identifies the jurisdiction of a school.

object.name: SectionInfo
object.desc: This object provides information about the section - the specific time period a session of the course meets

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies this section entity

attribute.name: SchoolCourseInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that identifies the course being taught in this section

element.name: ScheduleInfoList
element.desc: The schedule-related information for a section

element.name: MediumOfInstruction
element.desc: Medium through which the student receives instructional communication from the teacher

element.name: LanguageOfInstruction
element.desc: Language in which the section is taught

element.name: LocationOfInstruction
element.desc: Description of the location in which the section is taught

element.name: SchoolCourseInfoOverride
element.desc: Optional overrides of the course information for this section

element.name: RoomInfoRefId
element.desc: The ID (GUID) of the room in which this section is taught

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: The type of assignment: Advisor or Counselor

attribute.name: StaffPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: Reference to the StaffPersonal object associated with this enrollment

object.name: StaffAssignment
object.desc: This object defines information related to a staff member's assignment(s); commonly, this will be a school assignment. SIF_Events are reported.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID that uniquely identifies a particular staff assignment.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that identifies the school where the staff member is assigned.

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g., "2004" for the 2003-04 school year).

attribute.name: StaffPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: ID (GUID) of this staff member, as represented in the StaffPersonal object.

element.name: Description
element.desc: Short assignment description

element.name: JobStartDate
element.desc: This is the date from which the staff assignment is valid (inclusive).

element.name: JobEndDate
element.desc: This is the date through which the staff assignment is valid (inclusive).

element.name: JobFTE
element.desc: Full-time job equivalent ratio for this assignment. (Format is x.xx; an employee who is full-time and who is 50% of their time on this assignment would be represented as 0.50)

element.name: JobFunction
element.desc: The purpose of the activities as related to students

element.name: TeachingAssignment
element.desc: The teacher field taught by the individual

element.name: GradeClassification
element.desc: An indication of the grade level(s) the individual is assigned

element.name: ItinerantTeacher
element.desc: Is this staff itinerant for this assignment?

element.name: InstructionalLevel
element.desc: An indication of the general nature of instruction provided throughout a course.

element.name: EmployeePersonalRefId
element.desc: A pointer to the EmployeePersonal object to be able to establish a link between HR employee objects and SIS staff objects.

element.name: StaffPersonalRefId
element.desc: Staff assigned to this room. For example, the homeroom teacher.

object.name: StaffPersonal
object.desc: Contains all of the personal information relating to a staff member, who might be a teacher or other employee of the school or district.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of the staff member this object is linked to

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-assigned identifier for this staff member. For a description of this element, see 5.1.16 LocalId.

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: The state-assigned identifier for this staff member. For a description of this element, see 5.1.29 StatePrId.

element.name: ElectronicIdList
element.desc: Barcode, magstripe, or PIN associated with this entity. For a description of this element, see 5.1.7 ElectronicId.

element.name: OtherIdList
element.desc: The other IDs this staff member is identified by

element.name: Name
element.desc: The Name element contains the name of the staff member

element.name: Title
element.desc: The staff member's title.

element.name: EmailList
element.desc: The e-mail addresses of this staff member

element.name: Demographics
element.desc: Demographic information describing the staff member

element.name: AddressList
element.desc: The addresses of this staff member

element.name: PhoneNumberList
element.desc: The telephone numbers of this staff member

element.name: EmployeePersonalRefId
element.desc: Allows for a linkage to the HR/Fin EmployeePersonal object

attribute.name: PickupOrDropoff
attribute.desc: Specifies if this is a pickup or dropoff address. This property may be needed by a transportation application.

attribute.name: DayOfWeek
attribute.desc: This attribute indicates the days of the week for which the pickup or dropoff address is valid. The attribute if relevant only if the value of the PickupOrDropoff attribute is "Pickup," "Dropoff" or "Both."

element.name: Address
element.desc: This is the actual address.

object.name: StudentAddressList
object.desc: A student address

attribute.name: PickupOrDropoff
attribute.desc: Specifies if this is a pickup or dropoff address

attribute.name: DayOfWeek
attribute.desc: The days of the week for which the pickup or dropoff address is valid

element.name: Address
element.desc: The street address

object.name: StudentContact
object.desc: Contains a student's contact information.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of this contact

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of the student whose contact this is.

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Type of student contact

element.name: Name
element.desc: The name of this contact.

element.name: PhoneNumberList
element.desc: The contact's phone number

element.name: EmailList
element.desc: The contact's e-mail address

element.name: Demographics
element.desc: Demographic information about this contact

element.name: AddressList
element.desc: The contact's address

element.name: OtherIdList
element.desc: The other IDs by which this contact is known

element.name: Relationship
element.desc: The relationship of the contact to the student

element.name: EmployerType
element.desc: An NCES code that defines the employer type

element.name: EducationalLevel
element.desc: A code for the contact's educational level

object.name: StudentDailyAttendance
object.desc: This object provides daily attendance information for a particular student in a particular school on a particular date. SIF_Events are reported.

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the student for whom this attendance information is being reported

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the school for which this attendance information is being reported

attribute.name: Date
attribute.desc: The calendar date for to which this attendance information relates (CCYYMMDD)

element.name: DailyAttendanceCode
element.desc: Locally-defined attendance code information

element.name: TimeIn
element.desc: The time the student entered or returned to the school (HH:MM:SS)

element.name: TimeOut
element.desc: The time the student left school (HH:MM:SS)

element.name: AttendanceNote
element.desc: Note related to this particular attendance

object.name: StudentPersonal
object.desc: The StudentPersonal object contains personal information related to a student.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of the student that this object is linked to.

element.name: AlertMessages
element.desc: The AlertMessage element contains an alert message that is associated with the student.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-assigned identifier for this student. For a description of this element, see 5.1.16 LocalId.

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: The state-assigned identifier for this student. For a description of this element, see 5.1.29 StatePrId.

element.name: ElectronicIdList
element.desc: Barcode, magstripe, or PIN associated with this entity. For a description of this element, see 5.1.7 ElectronicId.

element.name: OtherIdList
element.desc: The OtherId element lists an alternate ID associated with the student.

element.name: Name
element.desc: The Name element contains the name of the student.

element.name: EmailList
element.desc: The Email element contains an e-mail address for the student.

element.name: ProjectedGraduationYear
element.desc: Currently projected graduation year.

element.name: OnTimeGraduationYear
element.desc: First projected graduation year, usually determined when student is accepted into 9th grade.

element.name: GraduationDate
element.desc: The actual date a student Graduated

element.name: Demographics
element.desc: The Demographics element contains student demographic information.

element.name: AddressList
element.desc: The StudentAddress element contains an address for the student.

element.name: PhoneNumberList
element.desc: The PhoneNumber element contains a phone number for the student.

object.name: StudentPicture
object.desc: A student picture.

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of the student

element.name: PictureSource
element.desc: The picture

object.name: StudentSchoolEnrollment
object.desc: This object defines information related to a student's enrollment. SIF_Events are reported. StudentSchoolEnrollment instances must not span multiple school years.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies a particular enrollment

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the student linked to this enrollment

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the school linked to this enrollment

attribute.name: MembershipType
attribute.desc: The type of school this is

attribute.name: TimeFrame
attribute.desc: The The timeframe of the enrollment based on the SIF_Date in the SIF_Header of the message. For events, it is determined as of the date the event is generated. For requests and responses, it is calculated based on the date of the request.

element.name: SchoolYear
element.desc: School year for which this enrollment is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g. 2007 for the 2006-07 school year). StudentSchoolEnrollment instances must not span multiple school years.

element.name: EnrollStatus
element.desc: The status of this enrollment (deprecated)

element.name: EntryDate
element.desc: The date from when this enrollment is valid

element.name: EntryType
element.desc: Code indicating the type of entry for this enrollment (deprecated)

element.name: GradeLevel
element.desc: Grade or academic level of student

element.name: Homeroom
element.desc: Homeroom for this enrollment

element.name: StaffAssigned
element.desc: Staff assigned to the student for this enrollment

element.name: ExitDate
element.desc: The last School calendar day (membership day) the student was enrolled in the school (inclusive). If the student has existed the school, ExitDate must have a value.

element.name: ExitStatus
element.desc: Indicates whether this exit from the school is considered to be temporary or permanent

element.name: ExitType
element.desc: Code indicating the type of exit for this enrollment (deprecated)

element.name: FTE
element.desc: Full-time equivalent numeric value of the student's course load during this enrollment, expressed in decimal form, where 1.00 represents a full-time enrollment

element.name: FTPTStatus
element.desc: An indication of whether the student is enrolled full-time or part-time

element.name: ResidencyStatus
element.desc: Location of an individual's legal residence relative to (within or outside) the boundaries of the school for this enrollment. Source: 0598 (Public School Residence Status) [NCESHandbooks]

element.name: NonResidentAttendReason
element.desc: If the school represented by this enrollment is outside of the student's usual attendance area (as indicated in the ResidencyStatus element), this element indicates the reason that the student attends this school. Source: 0599 (Non-Resident Attendance Rationale) [NCESHandbooks]

object.name: StudentSectionEnrollment
object.desc: This object contains information about a student's enrollment in a section of a course. SIF_Events are reported.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies this StudentSectionEnrollment entity

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the student to whom the enrollment information applies

attribute.name: SectionInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the section in which this student is enrolled

element.name: EntryDate
element.desc: Date from when this course section enrollment is valid

element.name: ExitDate
element.desc: The last school calendar day (membership day) the student was enrolled in the course section (inclusive).

element.name: ScheduleInfoOverrideList
element.desc: A complete replacement of the ScheduleInfo of the section for this student; this should be a subset of the schedule information for the section

element.name: CreditsAttempted
element.desc: Number of credits the student is attempting to earn. If present, this element's value overrides the credits in SchoolCourseInfo and SectionInfo.

object.name: StudentSnapshot
object.desc: This object provides a snapshot of a student's record on a given day. All information reported in the object is reported as it appeared in the responding system on the date specified in SnapDate. It can be used for synching data across applications, for periodically loading a data warehouse, or for vertical reporting of data to a requesting authority, such as a state department of education. SIF_Events are not reported.

attribute.name: SnapDate
attribute.desc: The date the data snapshot was taken.

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the student to whom this information relates.

element.name: SchoolYear
element.desc: School year in which the SnapDate falls, and for which the information is applicable. For a description, see the common element 5.1.27 SchoolYear.

element.name: Name
element.desc: The name of the student. For a description, see the common element 5.1.18 Name.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-defined identifier for this student. For a description, see the common element 5.1.16 LocalId.

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: The state-assigned identifier for this student. For a description, see the common element 5.1.29 StatePrId.

element.name: Address
element.desc: The address of the student. For a description, see the common element 5.1.1 Address

element.name: RaceList
element.desc: Person's race

element.name: Gender
element.desc: Person's gender. For a description, see the common element 5.1.4 Demographics/Gender.

element.name: BirthDate
element.desc: The person's date of birth. For a description, see the common element 5.1.4 Demographics/BirthDate.

element.name: Age
element.desc: The age (in years) of the student on the date in SnapDate.

element.name: ProjectedGraduationYear
element.desc: Currently projected graduation year.

element.name: OnTimeGraduationYear
element.desc: First projected graduation year, usually determined when student is accepted into 9th grade.

element.name: GraduationDate
element.desc: First projected graduation year, usually determined when student is accepted into 9th grade.

element.name: GraduationAward
element.desc: The award received upon graduation.

element.name: GraduationOnTime
element.desc: Did the student graduate in the expected number of years?

element.name: HomeEnrollment
element.desc: Enrollment-related information for the school that is responsible for reporting the student's membership/child accounting information. This is most likely the primary enrollment site for the student.

element.name: IDEA
element.desc: Is the student IDEA-eligible ("special education")? (Mutually exclusive with Section 504 classification.)

element.name: Migrant
element.desc: Is this a migrant student ?

element.name: Title1
element.desc: Is the student in Title 1 programs?

element.name: GiftedTalented
element.desc: Is the student in Gifted/Talented programs?

element.name: EconomicDisadvantage
element.desc: Does the student meet the State criteria for classification as having an economic disadvantage?

element.name: ELL
element.desc: Is the student an English Language Learner under Title 3?

element.name: Homeless
element.desc: Is the student homeless

element.name: Section504
element.desc: Is the student a qualified individual under Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act? (Mututally exclusive with IDEA classification.)

element.name: Immigrant
element.desc: Does the student meet the State criteria for classification as being an immigrant?

object.name: TeachingAssignment
object.desc: The teacher field taught by the individual

attribute.name: Code
attribute.desc: The type of teaching assignment this is. Source: 0436 (Teaching Assignment) [NCES Handbooks]

object.name: TermInfo
object.desc: This object provides information about a term (a reportable period of time). SIF_Events are reported.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies the TermInfo entity

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies the school where this term is used

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g. "2004" for the 2003-2004 school year)

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: Starting date of the term (CCYYMMDD)

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: Ending date of the term (CCYYMMDD)

element.name: Description
element.desc: Text-based description of the term

element.name: RelativeDuration
element.desc: Portion of the school year represented by this term, expressed in decimal form precise to 4 decimal places (e.g. 0.1333)

element.name: TermCode
element.desc: Locally-defined code

element.name: Track
element.desc: The name, description, or code of the track that contains this term. This is used when there are multiple tracks within a school. For instance, kindergarten commonly has a different set of terms than other grades within the school.

element.name: TermSpan
element.desc: An NCES code for Session type

value.name: CURRENT
value.desc: Today's date falls between EntryDate and ExitDate (inclusive)
